page.title: 06THE SCOUT CAMP DUNHAM MASSEY
page.content: Dumham Massey scout camp is just outside the walls of the park. The camp has a big flag pole which you can see from the A56, an assault course which is mainly made of wood and a tree house with a rope ladder. The assault course has a river which is very muddy and this runs through the middle of the course. Over this river is a rope swing and if you don't swing over you get very muddy. The camp also has a place for a big camp fire and round the outside of the camp there is a wood. To get to the camp you can go through the park and over a stile, but sometimes the stile is blocked and the steps taken away. You can also get to the camp from the A56 turning off and going along a very narrow,bumpy road.The camp is used for weekend,and one week stays-also one day events.
